attributes.action: Introduce mandatory random drug testing for MPs
attributes.background: With recent discussion of stopping benefits for those with addictions, it seems only fitting that those representing us in the Houses of Parliament are subject to random drugs testing.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105070 

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
